text: Ania Spiering is a Russian born American actress and fashion modelhttps://bust.com/style/16249-how-one-model-is-aging-in-the-fashion- industry-bust-interview.html known for films Argo, Land of the Lost and The Hungover Games. She was also a face of the fourth season of American Horror Story: Freak Show.http://russianchicagomag.com/ania_gerasimova_spiering/ ==References== ==External links== * *Ania Spiering on Instagram *Ania Spiering *BIANCA STARR : ONE LIFE : BIANCA@BIANCASTARR.COM *Interview with Ania Gerasimova-Spiering Category:Living people Category:American film actresses Category:American female models Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Ania Spiering
